chapters.title: Chapter 4: Data Structures
chapters.goal: Learn the core Python data structures by building applications that demonstrate these concepts and learning from the illustrated explanations of these important concepts.

chapters.title: Chapter 5: Functions
chapters.goal: Understand how to modularize applications using functions and lambdas to create more maintainable code.

chapters.title: Chapter 6: Object-Oriented Programming
chapters.goal: Learn object-oriented programming techniques that provide encapsulation and abstraction for building more complex applications.

chapters.title: Chapter 7: Unit Tests
chapters.goal: AI is a great assistant for unit testing. Learn how to apply AI to automatically write unit tests and assertions of your code.

chapters.title: Chapter 8: Project: Simple World Clock & Time Converter
chapters.goal: Use an agentic approach to guide the AI to write an application that displays a world clock and does timezone conversions.
